actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: To amend the Packers and Stockyards Act, 1921, to clarify the duties relating to services furnished in connection with the buying or selling of livestock in commerce through online, video, or other electronic methods, and for other purposes.
short_title: Technical and Clarifying Amendments to the Packers and Stockyards Act of 2016

titles.title: Technical and Clarifying Amendments to the Packers and Stockyards Act of 2016

To amend the Packers and Stockyards Act, 1921, to clarify the duties relating to services furnished in connection with the buying or selling of livestock in commerce through online, video, or other electronic methods, and for other purposes.
Technical and Clarifying Amendments to the Packers and Stockyards Act of 2016
